headline: 3 Film & Television Production Stocks to Watch Amid Dull Industry Trends
summary: Film and television production and distribution companies like IMAX, WMG and TKO are thriving due to the heightened consumption of digital entertainment despite heavy spending on original programming and exclusive rights.

headline: UFC® and Skilled Trades College (STC) Renew Partnership to Support Trades Education
summary: UFC and STC Increase Collaboration to Promote Technical Training Opportunities as STC Plans Expansion to the U.S.LAS VEGAS and TORONTO, Jan. 22, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- UFC®, the world’s premier mixed martial arts organization, and Skilled Trades College (STC), the Canadian leader in training youth in skilled trades, today announced a multiyear renewal of their partnership to increase awareness of the importance of hands-on training and career readiness for aspiring tradespeople.
